comments:
Description:
Bind data item with new Date() returned error in Web Viewer.

Steps to reproduce:
1.Insert a data item.
2.Input aa as name, datetime as datatype, new Date() as expression.
3.Preview in Web Viewer.

Expected result:
Display current datetime.

Actual result:

There are errors on the report page: 
-There are error(s) in report : report 
Error0 : Error.ScriptEvaluationError ( 1 time(s) )
